ygData.subject: RE: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey! Who says fishing isn t worth the time spent on it? All of my characters do fishing as a major pasttime of their lives! Fish sell for 2s each! And when
ygData.messageBody:
>Actually, I've found with sense heading, wisdom seems more of a bonus
>than int, because sense heading skill only improves when it's
>successful, unlike most other skills. And, wisdom definately seems to
>make a difference with it improving. The easiest way I've found to deal
>with sense heading is to not waste time on it until you can dump 20 odd
>points into it. That usually means around L5 or 6. Then start mashing it
>while medding or resting. At least with wisdom casters like my druid and
>cleric, this method seems much less painful than I remember it was for
>my bard. IIRC, with my bard I used to fish and practice sense heading.
>It went up a lot slower and the fishing wasn't worth the time spent on
>it, unlike in beta when not only could fishing be slightly profitable
>but you also had a cool social scene around the docks.

Hey! Who says fishing isn't worth the time spent on it?
All of my characters do fishing as a major pasttime of their lives!
Fish sell for 2s each! And when you fish up sandals (Meara is still
wearing Tattered Sandals she fished up), fish scales (Water Breathing
anyone?) and Rusty daggers, they don't even use a lure up!

Faerain sits around fishing while she maxes out various spell
skills. (She made 19 and teleports last night!) And Faesong uses
the fish in her baking skills.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow)
